[刀]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – a knife. The original form was 𠚣, which can be found in a variant of 利 , 𥝢 (in turn used on the top of the character 黎 ).

[刁]
Variant of 刀 ( dāo ).

[彫]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *tɯːw ): semantic 彡 ( “ representing patterns or ornamentation ” ) + phonetic 周 ( OC *tjɯw ) . It represents the act of carving patterns, and by extension, conveys the meaning "to engrave" or "to carve." [ 1 ]

[雕]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *tɯːw ): phonetic 周 ( OC *tjɯw ) + semantic 隹 .
